item.title: Arena Stats
item.content:encoded:
Everyone starts off with 3 gen 3 nin and 3 tai attacks in the arena but for 20,000 you can reroll them to another set up of you're choice (I think the minimum in any one stat is 2 and the maximum 5). I'm not quite sure where/how to put this on the page. Plus I don't know much about it myself (such as weather the change loops with you, or if there's any increase/decrease in price at any point due to time or items). Just thought I'd ask if anyone knew more about this or if ayone knew how to properly state this on the page.

Oh and can this be added to the "Guides" section? I think it would be quite fitting.
